body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Auto Group customer service. My name is Randy Green. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Randy. My name is Victoria Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Victoria. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need some information about the car warranty. Do you offer extended warranty plans?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, we do offer extended warranty plans. Can you please provide me with your telephone number so I can look up your warranty details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My number is five five five, two zero zero, nine eight seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Victoria. And could you also confirm the last four digits of your social security number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Victoria. I will look into your warranty details and get back to you promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Randy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Victoria. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
